subject: How to avoid running a test class multiple times
msgSnippet: Is there a way to tell JUnit to execute a class only once no matter how many times it appears in an invoked test suite? E.g., say SomeTestClass.java is
messageBody:
Is there a way to tell JUnit to execute a class only once no matter how many times it appears in an invoked test suite?

E.g., say SomeTestClass.java is included in both test suite 'A'
and test suite 'B'. But I have a higher-level suite call 'All' which includes both 'A' and 'B'. Running 'All' will thus run SomeTestClass.java twice. Is there a way to prevent that?
